title: Altaf Wani felicitates Pakistan on Independence Day
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 13 (APP):Senior Vice Chairman Jammu and Kashmir National Front (JKNF) Altaf Hussain Wani on Tuesday extended his heartfelt felicitations to the people and the government of Pakistan on Independence Day.
In a statement issued  here, Wani said, “The people of Indian occupied territory of Jammu and Kashmir owe a debt of gratitude to the people as well as the successive governments of the Pakistan for their all out moral, political and diplomatic support to their just and legitimate struggle for right to self-determination”.
Wishing greater peace, progress and prosperity for the people of Pakistan, the  front leader said that a strong and stable Pakistan was guarantor for the success of Kashmiris’ freedom movement.
Altaf Wani expressed the optimism that the Pakistan’s present day government would leave no stone unturned to help struggling people of the Indian occupied Jammu and Kashmir to seek their internationally recognized right, the right to self determination for which they have offered unprecedented sacrifices.
Terming Kashmir issue as an unfinished agenda of the partition of the Indian subcontinent, Wani said that the vision of a stable and prosperous Pakistan envisioned by its founders would remain elusive unless Kashmir was freed from the Indian bondage.
